t: Shade or sun? Forest structure affects tree responses to Amazon drought
s: April 17, 2019 - The researchers found that it was actually the small trees exposed to high sunlight levels in forest openings that lost leaves during dry periods, while shaded trees added to their leaf area in synchrony with the larger canopy trees above them.
